content:
Since last week (unfortunately I don't know exactly when it changed), the IG header no longer shows the flag, only the jurisdiction code. Does anyone know why?
Example with flag: http://build.fhir.org/ig/ahdis/chmed/branches/master/index.html
Example with code (no flag): https://build.fhir.org/ig/ahdis/swissnoso/index.html
Are you seeing any messages in the build log?

What kind of message would I have to look for?
Log from the IG without the flag: http://build.fhir.org/ig/ahdis/swissnoso/branches/master/build.log
Nothing obvious there. Is your IG available on Git?
Found the issue. Was a bug in the publisher. PR submitted and Grahame says a fix should be out sometime tonight.
@Lloyd McKenzie thanks a lot!
latest 114 version did seem to fix the flag for me
